    Deep Learning-Based Architectures for Semantics Discovery of Entities and Events

    Research project focused on developing deep learning architectures for processing and understanding multimedia data.

    publications

    Mobile Robot Obstacle Detection and Avoidance with NAV-YOLO

    Published in International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research, 2024

    This paper proposes a vision-based navigation model that integrates a pre-trained YOLOv5 object detection model into a Robot Operating System (ROS) navigation stack to optimize obstacle detection and avoidance in a complex environment. The paper received the Best Paper Presentation award at the 11th ICCMA 2023 conference.

    Recommended citation: Adiuku N, Avdelidis NP, Tang G, et al. (2024) Mobile robot obstacle detection and avoidance with NAV-YOLO. International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research, Volume 13, Issue 2, March 2024, pp. 219-226
    Download Paper

    Deep Learning-Based Architectures for Semantics Discovery of Entities and Events

    Published in Workshop on Explainable AI in Human-Robot Interaction, ICANN 2024, Lugano, Switzerland, 2024

    Presentation at the Workshop on Explainable AI in Human-Robot Interaction at ICANN 2024, focusing on deep learning architectures for semantics discovery of entities and events in multimedia data.

    Download Paper
